Class UiUtils

java.lang.Object
taskmanagement.ui.util.UiUtils
public final class UiUtils extends Object
UiUtils ------- Swing utilities for styling widgets in a consistent, theme-aware way. This class is append-only: legacy helpers remain intact and new helpers are added without breaking existing signatures.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes

    Class
    Description
    static final class 
    UiUtils.RoundedMatteShadowBorder
    Rounded matte border with a soft bottom shadow (no external libs).

  • Method Details

    • styleStableHoverButton

      public static void styleStableHoverButton(JButton b, Color baseBg, Color baseFg)
      Styles a JButton to keep stable size on hover/press (no layout shift) while providing simple color feedback.
      Parameters:
      b - the button to style
      baseBg - base background color
      baseFg - base foreground (text/icon) color

    • shiftForContrast

      public static Color shiftForContrast(Color c, float ratio)
      Shift color toward light or dark depending on luminance (for hover/press).

    • bestTextFor

      public static Color bestTextFor(Color bg, Color preferred)
      Choose readable text color for a given background.

      Linear blend between two colors. t in [0..1].

      public static JButton createSquareActionButton(String text, Icon icon, Color bg, Color fg, int size, int cornerRadius, float fontSize)
      Create a square JButton with icon (top) and text (bottom), styled for dark backgrounds. (Legacy signature: used by ControlPanel.)

      Attach dark-theme hover/pressed color behavior.

      public static Color darken(Color c, float factor)
      Darken a color by factor in [0..1].

    • loadRasterIcon

      public static Icon loadRasterIcon(String classpath, int w, int h)
      Load PNG (or any raster) icon from classpath and scale to w×h. Path example: "/icons/add.png".

    • tryLoadSvgIcon

      public static Icon tryLoadSvgIcon(String classpath, int w, int h)
      Try loading SVG with FlatLaf Extras; returns null if not available.

    • makeDotIcon

      public static Icon makeDotIcon(int size, Color color)
      Small fallback icon (filled circle).

    • styleTextFieldForDarkCentered

      public static void styleTextFieldForDarkCentered(JTextField field)
      Style a JTextField for dark panels using AppTheme tokens (centered). Useful for ToolBox numeric/text inputs placed under titles.

    • styleTextField

      public static void styleTextField(JTextField field)
      Style a generic JTextField for dark UI (left-aligned). This is the common helper to use in dialogs (e.g., TaskEditorDialog).
      Parameters:
      field - the text field to style

    • styleTextField

      public static void styleTextField(JTextField field, Color bg, Color fg, Color border, boolean centered)
      Advanced variant for styling a JTextField with explicit colors and alignment.
      Parameters:
      field - the field to style
      bg - background color
      fg - text color
      border - border color
      centered - whether to center the text horizontally

    • styleTextArea

      public static void styleTextArea(JTextArea area)
      Style a JTextArea for dark UI in dialogs (e.g., task description). Wraps words, sets caret/selection colors, and applies a thin line border.
      Parameters:
      area - the text area to style

    • styleToolBoxTitleCentered

      public static void styleToolBoxTitleCentered(JLabel label)
      Style a ToolBox title label centered.

    • styleToolBoxLabelCentered

      public static void styleToolBoxLabelCentered(JLabel label)
      Style a ToolBox regular label centered.

    • flowCenter

      public static JPanel flowCenter(JComponent child)
      Helper: simple FlowLayout wrapper to center a single child.

    • createPrimaryIconButton

      public static JButton createPrimaryIconButton(String text, Icon icon, int width, int height, int cornerRadius, Font font, Color bg, Color fg)
      Create a primary rounded button with icon (icon left, text right), painted by us to avoid LAF artifacts. Non-breaking helper.

    • createPaintedRoundedIconButton

      public static JButton createPaintedRoundedIconButton(String text, Icon icon, Color bg, Color fg, int size, int cornerRadius, float fontSize)
      Create a rounded square button (size×size) that paints its own background, with an icon on top and text at the bottom. (Used by ControlPanel.)

    • styleHeaderPillButton

      public static void styleHeaderPillButton(JButton b, Color bg, Color fg)
      Style a compact rounded header button (pill-like) with stable hover/press. Keeps layout stable (no border size changes); paints background ourselves.
      Parameters:
      b - button to style
      bg - background color
      fg - foreground (text/icon) color
